name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Troy BROWN, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Troy BROWN, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 9th day of July, 2012, the Petition for Leave to File Petition for Allowance of Appeal Nunc Pro Tunc is GRANTED. Counsel is directed to file a Petition for Allowance of Appeal within 15 days of this order.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
47 A.3d 1178
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Troy BROWN, Petitioner.
No. 34 EM 2012.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 9, 2012.
